subject: Photography
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: If verified, a photograph of Roger Clemens at a party held by José Canseco would seem to refute Clemens’ testimony that he did not attend the party in 1998.
snippet: If verified, a photograph of Roger Clemens at a party held by José Canseco would seem to refute Clemens’ testimony that he did not attend the party in 1998.
